channel.title: Additive Manufacturing on Carrie’s Portfolio

item.title: DIY Mini CNC Laser Engraver
item.description:
Introduction

The objective of this project was to explore how additive manufacturing could enhance low-cost CNC systems by improving their functionality and accessibility. Through the use of 3D printed components, the work resulted in a stable and customizanle DIY CNC laser engraver.

Primary Components

The DIY Mini CNC Laser Engraver integrates a range of electronic, mechanical, and 3D printed components. Each part was selected for its functionality, accessibility and contribution to the overall system design.
